title: Carol Leonnig & Philip Rucker: "I Alone Can Fix It"
description: Michael sits down with Washington Post reporters Carol D. Leonnig & Philip Rucker on their book "I Alone Can Fix It: Donald J. Trump's Catastrophic Final Year." Original air date 21 July 2021. The book was published on 20 July 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Carol Leonnig, Philip Rucker)
